Identification_Area.title: Light Italian CubeSat for Imaging of Asteroids (LICIACube) Spacecraft

Modification_Detail.description: Created by A.C.Raugh from information downloaded from the public DART mission website maintained by the Applied Physics Laboratory at Johns Hopkins University (JHU APL) on 2021-08-12.

Internal_Reference.comment: The LICIACube mission operated in conjunction with the Double Asteroid Redirection Test (DART) mission.

Instrument_Host.description: The LICIACube is a CubeSat mission of the Agenzia Spaziale Italiana (ASI) that will be carried by the DART impactor to the vicinty of the Didymos system, then be released to observe the impact and aftermath of the collision of DART with Dimorphos. Note that as of this writing, it is not clear if the LICIACube team will archive its results with PDS.
